articles.title: Infosys Results Q1FY24: Infosys' ADR falls 9.7 percent in Nasdaq pre-market session - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Infosys Q1 Earnings Updates: Infosys’ American Depository Receipts (ADRs) have fallen by 9.7 percent in Nasdaq’s pre-market session. This is following the software major slashing its revenue guidance for FY24 to 1-3.5 percent from 4-7 percent, with the demand…
articles.content: In the first quarter of FY24, Infosysexperienced a decline in its workforce for the second consecutive quarter, with 6,940 fewer employees. As a result, the company's current headcount stands at 336,… [+275 chars]

articles.title: American Airlines reports second-quarter 2023 financial results - American Airlines Newsroom
articles.description: American Airlines Group Inc. today reported its second-quarter 2023 financial results, including: Record quarterly revenue of $14.1 billion, a 4.7% increase year over year. Second-quarter net income of $1.3 billion, or $1.88 per diluted share. Excluding net s…
articles.content:
